products.title: Radiant FR Silver
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure radiant fr silver flame retardant roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality flame retardant roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 200mm max width: 3000mm (1940mm fabric turned)
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 1740mm (3000mm fabric turned)
 	fabric composition: polyester
 	tube: robust aluminium tube
 	control: sidewinder or spring control
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
